title: 2011년 Locken 사건
summary: 미국 North Dakota, ND 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Locken. 판결일: 2011-05-11. 법원: North Dakota Supreme Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Locken v. Locken
**판결일**: 2011-05-11
**법원**: North Dakota Supreme Court
**관할**: North Dakota, ND

## 인용

- 2011 ND 90

## 판결문 요약


Filed 5/11/11 by Clerk of Supreme Court

IN THE SUPREME COURT

STATE OF NORTH DAKOTA







2011 ND 85







State of North Dakota, 		Plaintiff and Appellee



v.



Shane Keith Duncan, 		Defendant and Appellant







No. 20100323







Appeal from the District Court of Burleigh County, South Central Judicial District, the Honorable Bruce A. Romanick, Judge.



AFFIRMED.



Opinion of the Court by Crothers, Justice.



Pamela Ann Nesvig (argued), Assistant State’s Attorney, Burleigh County Courthouse, P.O. Box 5518, Bismarck, ND 58506-5518, for plaintiff and appellee.



Michael Ray Hoffman (argued), 120 North 3rd Street, Suite 100, P.O. Box 1056, Bismarck, ND 58502-1056, for defendant and appellant.

State v. Duncan

No. 20100323



Crothers, Justice.

[¶1]	Shane Keith Duncan appeals the district court’s judgment entered after a jury convicted him of terrorizing, interference with a telephone during an emergency phone call and simple assault-domestic violence.  He argues the judgment should be reversed and an acquittal be entered because of prosecutorial misconduct.  We affirm.



I

[¶2]	Shane Duncan was charged with simple assault-domestic violence for willfully causing bodily injury to his wife Barbara Duncan on February 4, 2010, with terrorizing for threatening Barbara Duncan with a gun on February 6, 2010, and with intentionally interfering with Barbara Duncan’s emergency telephone call on February 6, 2010.

[¶3]	Shane Duncan pled not guilty to the three charges, an...
